title: Want to buy Lajoie Portrait - SGC or PSA
author: KYcollector

posts.post_title: Want to buy Lajoie Portrait - SGC or PSA
posts.post_content:
I’m getting back into tobacco world after and unwanted exit . Life happened and had to sell. I’d like to find a Lajoie portrait or possibly a batting as my first card back . SGC or PSA preferred. 

If you have one for sale please private message me. 

Thanks in advance.
nice one  ending tonight bid by 8pm PSA 4.5

[quote name="823dek" post=2042725]nice one  ending tonight bid by 8pm PSA 4.5[/QUOTE]

Missed that one , still looking. Thanks

We have a Lajoie w/Bat in SCG 4 and PSA 3.5 that are below comps currently in our set break auction.  You can find them at [url]www.t206cards.com[/url]

Here is the direct link to the Lajoie's:
